entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , La Scie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 12:30 AM NST Sunday 01 January 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.1°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning then changing to periods of snow in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Local amount 5 cm over southern sections. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
